targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "elasticsearch_cluster_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

// SELECT last("count_total") FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_nodes" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_clusterstats_nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count_total")
  |> group()
  |> last()

// SELECT mean("docs_count") FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "docs_count")
  |> group()
  |> last()

// SELECT mean("store_size_in_bytes") FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "store_size_in_bytes")
  |> group()
  |> last()

// SELECT mean("mem_heap_used_percent") FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_jvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mem_heap_used_percent")
  |> group()
  |> last()

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "elasticsearch_cluster_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
//SELECT mean("segments_fixed_bit_set_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_index_writer_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_norms_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_points_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_stored_fields_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_term_vectors_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_terms_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("segments_version_map_memory_in_bytes") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("io_stats_total_operations"), 1s) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_fs" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node_name" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_fs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "io_stats_total_operations")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("query_cache_hit_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("query_cache_miss_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("gc_collectors_old_collection_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) offset 1

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_jvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gc_collectors_old_collection_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("gc_collectors_young_collection_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) offset 1

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_jvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gc_collectors_young_collection_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis"), 1s) AS "Old", non_negative_derivative(max("gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis"), 1s) AS "Young" FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_jvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis"), 1s) AS "Old", non_negative_derivative(max("gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis"), 1s) AS "Young" FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_jvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("indexing_index_total"), 1s) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node_name" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "indexing_index_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("search_fetch_time_in_millis"), 1s) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "search_fetch_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("get_time_in_millis"), $__interval) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "get_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("search_query_total"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "search_query_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("indexing_index_time_in_millis"), 1s) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "indexing_index_time_in_millis")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
|> derivative()

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("merges_total_time_in_millis"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "merges_total_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("flush_total_time_in_millis"), $__interval) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "flush_total_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

// SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("search_query_time_in_millis"), 1s) FROM "$policy"."elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "elasticsearch_indices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "search_query_time_in_millis")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
